text: hay, roasty, grass, citrus, herbs, earthy, golden, hazy, white foam, light sweetness, medium bitterness, medium body, sticky, soft carbonation, bitter,
Flaska från SB. Smak och doft av humle, belgisk jäst, gräs, grapefrukt och citrusskal. Torr, lagom sötma, något sträv, fin beska med smak av grapefrukt- och citrusskal.

22/06/2017 @home - 33cl bottle from Bierhalle Deconinck.
clear yellow with nice creamy white head. Nose is malty, bit hay, hints of spice. Taste has first a sweet malty touch, touch of grains, than some moderate hop bitterness. Sweeter and less bitter than expected so they surprised me again. Nice!

A hazy, yellow, tasty looking beer with a two finger high, fluffy, white head that leaves a lot of lacing on the glass. 

Nose: Belgian yeast, typical De Ranke nose - must be their yeast. Sweet malt, hay, grass, bread and resin. 
Taste: Bitter hops, grass, pine, grapefruit, orange and herbs. 
Mouth: Medium body. High carbonation. Dry and bitter ending.

Pours light cloudy golden with low white head 
Aromas crisp, hoppy, spices, bread, some phenols 
Taste has crisp, bready and bitter notes of herbs, hay, citrus, grass
Like a belgo pilsner!

Keg at Cafe Beermoth, Manchester. Interesting style; looks like a blonde or a wit, and has a not dissimilar aroma. However, it's super hoppy and incredibly bitter on the finish. Maybe even too bitter...
Hazy yellow color, large white head. Aromas of yeast, wheat, light hops, spices and bread. Bitter taste of hops, yeast, resin, grass and citrus peel. Mediocre. 6-3-6-3-12.

Bottle from Systembolaget. Slightly hazy golden with white head. Aroma is citrus, spices, bubblegum and grain. Taste is bitter chewing gum, grassy hops with a lingering bitter, grainy finish. Light and crisp.
On tap at moeder lambic. Clear straw yellow colour small white head. Nose is light bitterness. taste is low bitterness. Lingering bitter aftertate. Light and refreshing.

Flaska från SB. En lättare XX bitter som verkligen nte kompromissar med smakerna och med en lättare kropp blir den höiga och gräsiga beskan ännu påtagligare. Härlig belgojäst karaktär i grunden bär också smakerna. Riktigt gott.
Hazy golden color with fin white head. Herbal aroma, mild citrus and fruity. Medium body, medium sweetness. Nice and refreshing and highly drinkable beer.

A nice, bitter ale. Fresh, with a crisp, bitter, grape aftertaste. Quite nice.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

330ml bottle from Systembolaget. Hazy bright golden, long lasting, large, white head, rich lacing around the glass. Peppery belgo yeast aroma, fruity, apricot, orange, floral and herbs. Light and sliky mouthfeel, soft carbonated. Earthy, grassy, fruity and peppery taste, cirtus zest, grains, and soapy notes. Long and pleasantly rough bitterness in the finish. Very tasty, De Ranke never fails!

Bottled from Systembolaget
Hazy golden with a white head. 
Herbal, Grassy, Fruity aroma. 
Yeasty, peppery flavour. 
Medium bitterness.
Guldgul, disig med stort vitt skum. Doftar belgisk jäst, med fin fruktighet och lite kryddor. Detsamma finns i smaken men tas raskt över av en stor beska, som jag tycker är onödigt stor och kraftig.
@Basunen 17-6-10: småtrevlig humlig med en tydlig besk eftersmak. Fin fyllighet. Helt ok.
Pilsnerfärgad disig med vit skum. Doftar och smakar maltigt, örtigt lite gräsigt. Väldigt belgisk med torr avslutning

Bottle (33 cl) from Systembolaget. Shady golden, medium white head. Wonderful grainy malt aroma with peppery phenols and herbal hops. Light to medium bodied, medium to high carbonation. Dry, high bitterness.
330ml Bottle - Hazy golden with a white head. Hay, lemon, peach and some yeasty notes in the aroma. Peach, bread, lemon and hints of banana in the taste.
Flaska från SB. Guldisig med högt fluffigt vitt skum. Kryddiga toner med inslag av skumbanan, bröd och jäst. Lätt men ganska markant beska och bra kick i avslutningen. Helt ok!

Hazy straw golden color with a fine white head. Solid lacing. Looks inviting. Moderate intensity in the aroma. Fine medium body and a fine carbonation level. Mellow fine sweetness. Malty, herbal, mild citric and mild fruity flavor. Nice refreshing and easy drinkable beer. Far far away from a normal Kölsch :-)[On tap at Akkurat in Stockholm, Sweden]Manchester United - Ajax 2-0
Bottle, 4.5%. Slightly hazy golden with medium white head. Aroma is malt, fruit, yeast, hop, grass and straw. Flavour is malt, fruit, yeast, little sweet, hop, grass, straw and bitter.

On tap at Akkurat. 

Hazy golden with a white head. Aroma of hops, grain, some bread and citrus. Similar taste. The body was medium as was the bitterness. The finish was on the dry side.
A dark gold. Lots of haze. Lots of off white lacing. Smells good. Peppery, lemon, malt and oats. Chewy malt flavor with honey, wood, grist and cereal. Very dry pine bitterness throughout

0,33l bottle at home. BB 23.03.2019. yellow rather hazy color, small white head. smells citric, doughy, yeasty, light musty, light sweetness, bit flowery. nice smell. light body, medium carbonation, slick mouthfeel. tastes grassy, citric, earthy, peppery, light yeast, bit musty, some grains. finishes medium bitter with notes of citrus, grass and grains. nice one overall, bitterness is almost a bit harsh for me, I would prefer it a bit more mellow. overall nice beer.

(Draught at Chez Moeder Lambic Fontainas, Brussels, 19 May 2017) Greenish yellow colour with frothy, white head. Fruity nose with citrus, lemon, grass and peaches. Fruity, hoppy taste with notes of citrus, lemon, lime, grass, slightly bready malt and a balanced citric bitterness. Medium body, quite dry. Fresh and tasty, quite hoppy for a kölsch. Nice one.

Draught at Akkurat. Light hazy light golden liquid with medium white head. Aroma of floral hops, grain, earth, bread and light metal. Taste is dry and medium bitter with notes of floral hops, earth and grain. Medium bodied with medium carbonation. Quite bitter, but drinkable. Nice stuff!

Huge, dense, stable, just-yellowish head over hazy orangey yellow beer, finely carbonated. Spicy nose, other grains-like and yeasty aroma, hint at coriander, velvet or felt. Bitter-hoppy, EU hops, bit metallic flavour. Less spicy than the nose suggested, no restsugars. Light body, good carbonation, serious hopbite. Refreshing. Quite nice in its style - but change the hops to C-hops, and it becomes a smashing session IPA.
Tap. Pours hazy golden with a white head. Aroma of citrus, breadcrust, fruity, grassy, notes of grains. Quite bitter loads of citrus and fruity, honey dew. Quite.

Superbe robe dorée, belle mousse crémeuse, persistante. Nez tout en fraîcheur, sur de belles notes de houblon, dagrumes, de malt léger, de fruits jaunes, sur un fond de levures. Bouche à lattaque fraîche et amère, bulle tendue, fine amertume qui apporte une fraîcheur impressionnante à lensemble. Une bière délcieusement raffraîchissante par cette canicule.
On tap at Akkurat. Very soft mouthfeel with pretty dry, bitter aftertaste. Taste of hay, white bread, orange zest and lots of eucalyptus. Almost a cough drop in aftertaste.
Bottle @ Willems, Grobbendonk. Thanks Jacob!. Pours Hazy golden with a white head. Herbal and grainy. Grassy hops. Soft body and carbonation. Quaffable.

A: Very light straw with a medium head
N: Hint of acidity, leafy greens
T: Light complexity. Little notes of hops and grains
P: Thin
O: Refreshing and complex session beer

How: Draught.
Where: Akkurat, Stockholm.
Appearance: Hazy golden colour with a white head.
Aroma: Citrus, malt, spices, some fruit.
Body: Medium body and carbonation.
Flavour: Citrus, fruit, malt, malt, spices.
On tap @ Ölfestival 2017. Cloudy yellow with a tiny white head. Fruity and malty tones. Fruit, malt, herbs and hops. Medium to light body with bitter / fruity finish.

Fruity and malty with some citrus fruity notes, sweet bready malts, slight spice, grassy and slight floral hoppy into the close.
@ Moeder Lambic Fontainas. Hazy colour, white foam. Grassy, citrussy and hoppy beer. Dry and bitter. Refreshing. Easy drinkable. Again a very nice beer from De Ranke.

330 ml bottle from Etre Gourmet, bottled 13 Mar 17.
Golden, hazy body, with a big, frothy, rocky, lacing, off-white head.
Aroma of flowers, grass, fresh herbs, grains, dough, sweet fruits, lemongrass, some esters.
Tastes quite similar, with some more citrus, but a bit less fruits than the nose overall.
Light, slick mouthfeel, with an average carbonation.
Finishes dry, bitter, very crisp, floral, grassy, herbal, minerally, a bit citric, with lingering pine notes.

Tasty. Indeed drinks crisp and dry like a Pils, with lovely herbal notes throughout. The balance is outstanding, very fresh and easy, but rich and surprisingly complex at the same time, especially for the low ABV. Seems like the perfect hybrid of a Belgian ale and a Pils, two styles I like a lot if well executed.

Bottle from Cave a Bulles. Pours hazy gold with a large creamy/foamy white head. Aroma is somewhat fruity with pale/bready malt. Near med body. Flavor is hoppy and bitter. Dry for me. Its not all that light, and it has a great deal of flavor.

Draught at Moeder Lambic Fontaines, Brussels. With 77ships. Clear yellow with white head. The aroma has some fruitiness, hoppy, citrus (orange) and some maltiness. Bitterish flavor with notes of herbs and lemon. Slightly dry, light to medium-bodied.

Draft at Moeder Lambic, Fontainas, shared with 77ships. Clear yellow with a huge head. Aroma of fruity hops and soap. Sweetish, grainy, fruity, herbal, citrus, light bitterness. Light bodied with soft carbonation. Nice.
Tap @ Moeder Lambic, Fontainas. Hazy golden body with a small white head. Hops, blossoms, yeast, bread. Clean and very drinkable.
Bottle. Pale golden, medium white head, short retention. Vividly carbonated. Malts, yeast, hops in aroma. Medium body. Bitter taste throughout, yeast tones again in mouth.

Bouteille 33cl, BB 23/03/2019.
Dorée paille , col blanc crémeux.
Arôme au nez houblonné fleuri avec des effluves de grains assez marquées, le tout rappelle un peu les feuilles en infusion.
Palais est malté pils, assez sec dès la première gorgée virant sur des grains plus anciens comme épeautre. Le tout avec la levure garde un côté terreux et complété par des houblons nobles citronnés et fleuri. Vert très frais et une sécheresse perdurant en fin de bouche.

Bottle, [email protected]/* <![CDATA[ */!function(t,e,r,n,c,a,p){try{t=document.currentScript||function(){for(t=document.getElementsByTagName('script'),e=t.length;e--;)if(t[e].getAttribute('data-cfhash'))return t[e]}();if(t&&(c=t.previousSibling)){p=t.parentNode;if(a=c.getAttribute('data-cfemail')){for(e='',r='0x'+a.substr(0,2)|0,n=2;a.length-n;n+=2)e+='%'+('0'+('0x'+a.substr(n,2)^r).toString(16)).slice(-2);p.replaceChild(document.createTextNode(decodeURIComponent(e)),c)}p.removeChild(t)}}catch(u){}}()/* ]]> */, Kolding. Pours clear golden with a medium, staying creamy white head. Aroma has mild yeast, crisp malts, grassy hops. Medium carbonation, fine dry and quite creamy mouthfeel. Flavour has crisp malts, very soft esters, grassy, piney bitterness. Lingering bitterness, full feel at the end. Wonderful.

Draft @ Akkurat, Stockholm. Pours a hazy yellow color with a small white head. Has a fruity malty spicy weak yeasty hoppy aroma. Fruity malty spicy yeasty hoppy flavor. Has a fruity malty spicy weak yeasty hoppy finish.
Bij de ranke zijn ze meester in het balans brengen van smaken met dit nieuw bier slaan ze terug de nagel op de kop, veredelde ongefilterde pils die je doet denken aan vroeger. super!

11 EBC 50 IBU. Troebel goudkleurig bier met een witte wand klevende schuimkraag. Geur: Licht fruitig, vleugje perzik en wat kruidigheid. Smaak: licht tot redelijk bitter, harsachtig. Goede koolzuurprikkel. Afdronk: licht bitter, kruidig. Mooie dorstlesser. Wel iets te bitter om een Kölsch te zijn die wel hoppig maar veel milder zijn in smaak.

Piana biała, obfita ale mydlana, szybko opada do postrzępionych chmurek. Barwa żółto słomkowa, mętna. Aromat słodowo ziołowy, trawiasty, kwiatowy. W smaku podobnie, wodniste, słodowe, chlebowe, ziołowe, wytrawne, ze średnią, trawiastą goryczką. Dość wysoko wysycone.

Lekkie, sesyjne piwo bez historii, raczej "nijakie" niż "jakieś". 

Ps.

Czy taka mętność jest wskazana w tym stylu?
Draft. A hazy yellow beer with a straw, hops, spices, and malt. The flavor is sweet with notes of malt, straw, yeast, and malt, leading to a dry finish.
From tap at Taphouse. A hazy yellow coloured beer with a white head. Aroma and flavour of malt, fruit, hops, spice and with a bitter finish.
Draught at Taphouse. Hazy golden colour with a thin white head. Fruity aroma with grasses and pale malts. Fruits. Taste is bitter. Medium bodied. Finishes dry and bitter. Grasses.
From tap. Pours hazy yellow, small white head. Aroma is citrusy and grassy. Bitter, herbal, grassy and estery. Dry and bitter far finish. Herbal hoppy far finish.
Hazy gold pour with a white head. Vanilla, warm spice and honey aroma. Flavours of vanilla, honey and apricot. Tasty.

Tap at Moeder Original. Hazy golden color with white head. Aroma is grassy, earthy, some esters. Taste is earthy, grassy, Belgian dough, but very dry. Bitter finish, oily mouthfeel. Very nice, and flavourful for this ABV.

UPDATED: APR 21, 2017 Tap at Moeder Lambic Original. Pours almost clear golden. Aroma is Belgian dirt, farmhouse, damp cellar. Body is light, sweet, soft carbonation, almost thin. Still a bit dirty and farmhouse. Dry as... Good, very sessionable.
Simple et efficace : nez levures, joli houblonnage vert et sec, nez bien porté sur un caractère lager. Très aromatique pour du 4.5.

UPDATED: MAY 7, 2017 Draft glass @ Beerlovers Bar. Another highly impressive beer from De Ranke & wonderful concept. Hazy orange, big creamy white head. Nose is raw barn, hay, grass, raw bitter grainy, thick malt,... This may not be a pils but this everything that a pils should aspire to be, zero off-flavors, bitter & interesting raw grain profile. Taste is very thick pils malts, grain, big raw, barn, hay, white pepper, bitter low green,... Very thick grainy pils malt boidy. Very nice & this for Sweden. (Tried it on draft, no notes but fell complex & raw grain than bottled. Bottle is far better).

Draught at Fermentoren.
Hazy golden colored with a small white head.
Fruity aroma of caramel, hay and hops.
Fruity flavor of hops with notes of hay.
Hoppy finish.
Draught @ Akkuart. A really hoppy lager with heavy notes of herbs, citrus and hay. Also notes of sweet white bread. Bitter finish. Quenching!

Thnx to the representive. Pours rather cloudy blonde, small white head. Smell is malty, mild sweet touch, some sharp, almost funky grainy note. Taste is full, malty, bitter, aromatic , beauty trough simplicity . Very nice ! If this was a lager, itd probably be my favorite lager

Draught at Akkurat. 
Pours golden with a firm white head. 
Herbal aroma 
Taste of grass, parsley, some mint and orange zest. Quite carbonated.
Slightly muddy straw colour with a big, bubbly head. Aroma is grass, lemon, and cauliflower. Taste is quite bitter with hints of lemon.

Keg at Akkurat, Stockholm.  Cloudy golden, rich firm head. Rich floral spicy nose. Bone dry with light body and crisp mouthfeel. Bready and grainy, floral and grassy, minerally. Very bitter finish. Extremely elegant and refreshing.

UPDATED: APR 2, 2017 33cl-fles van bij Tabac&Co - Palais des bières te Dottenijs (in Famiflora). U: Troebel strolond met een witte schuimkraag. G: Bleekmout, gist, bitterhop en een lichte kruidigheid. S: Licht moutzoete aanzet en een stevige hopbitterheid in de afdronk. Verder wast gist- en kruidentoetsen. M: Dorstlesser met medium carbonatie.
